name: Biggun Shoot Ilands
description:
Biggun Shoot Ilands is the most immersive and realistic 3D helicopter battle action game. Launch the attack on the most dangerous terrorists now! Become a helicopter pilot and engage in combat missions across the deadly ruined world.
Features
• Action packed missions
• 10 exciting levels
• 3 different missions
• Warfare against army with soldiers, helicopters and much more!
• Multiple powerups to fend off the enemies like health kit, armor, and air strikes!
